Post._content:
### Ubuntu nginx ``` /home/wwwroot/default ``` vhost ``` sudo mkdir /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost ``` * * * siteA ``` sudo vi /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost/vhost_siteA.conf ``` 
    server {
    listen       80;                        # 
    server_name www.siteA.com siteA.com;    # 
    root  /home/wwwroot/default;              # 
    index index.html index.htm index.php;   # 

    location / {
        # WordPressURL
        if (!-e $request_filename) {
            rewrite (.*) /index.php;
        }
    }

    # PHP
    location ~ \.php$ {
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php5-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        include fastcgi_params;
    }
}
* * * siteB ``` sudo vi /etc/nginx/vhost/vhost_siteB.conf ``` 
    server {
    listen       80;                        # 
    server_name www.siteA.com siteA.com;    # 
    root  /home/wwwroot/old;              # 
    index index.html index.htm index.php;   # 

    location / {
        # WordPressURL
        if (!-e $request_filename) {
            rewrite (.*) /index.php;
        }
    }

    # PHP
    location ~ \.php$ {
        fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php5-fpm.sock;
        fastcgi_index index.php;
        include fastcgi_params;
    }
}
* * * nginx.conf ``` sudo vi /usr/local/nginx/conf/nginx.conf ``` http ``` include /usr/local/nginx/conf/vhost/*.conf; ``` nginx

```

```


```
docker create \
  --name=qbittorrent \
  -e PUID=1000 \
  -e PGID=1000 \
  -e TZ=Aisa/Shanghai \
  -e UMASK_SET=022 \
  -e WEBUI_PORT=8080 \
  -p 8999:8999 \
  -p 8999:8999/udp \
  -p 8080:8080 \
  -v /path/to/appdata/config:/config \
  -v /path/to/downloads:/downloads \
  --restart unless-stopped \
  linuxserver/qbittorrent
```

```
docker start qbittorrent
```

echo ":80 {  
 root /path/to/downloads
 timeouts none  
 gzip  
 browse  
}" > /usr/local/caddy/Caddyfile

```
####  Caddy 
```
echo ":80 {
 root /root/web
 timeouts none
 gzip
 browse
}" > /usr/local/caddy/Caddyfile
```

####  AriaNg
```
cd web && wget https://github.com/mayswind/AriaNg/releases/download/0.4.0/aria-ng-0.4.0.zip && unzip aria-ng-0.4.0.zip
```
 unzip

Post.title: rocket.chat
Post._content:
Rocket.Chat https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat #### Ubuntu 18.04 snap 
snap install rocketchat-server
#### caddy ``` sudo rocketchat-server.initcaddy ``` Caddyfile ``` nano /var/snap/rocketchat-server/current/Caddyfile ``` http://:8080 , powersee.tk ``` http://powersee.tk proxy / localhost:3000 { websocket transparent } ``` ``` sudo systemctl restart snap.rocketchat-server.rocketchat-caddy ``` SSL #### #### () SSL http:// powersee.tk #### play GitHub: armv7 x86https://github.com/RocketChat/Rocket.Chat.Cordova/releases/

Post.title: syncthing
Post._content:
###  

<!--more-->[](https://syncthing.net/) AndroidUbuntu Ubuntu[](https://apt.syncthing.net/)
Ubuntu
```
\# Add the release PGP keys:
curl -s https://syncthing.net/release-key.txt | sudo apt-key add -

\# Add the "stable" channel to your APT sources:
echo "deb https://apt.syncthing.net/ syncthing stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/syncthing.list

\# Update and install syncthing:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install syncthing
```
###  

Ubuntu`syncthing`  
`GUI and API listening on 127.0.0.1:8384`
`ctrl  C`  

###  


`vim ~/.config/syncthing/config.xml`
`127.0.0.1:8384` `0.0.0.0:8384`
  `i`  `Esc`  `:wq` ()

###  

`IP:8384` ( `192.168.123.184:8384` )    ID

\# Add the release PGP keys:
curl -s https://syncthing.net/release-key.txt | sudo apt-key add -

\# Add the "stable" channel to your APT sources:
echo "deb https://apt.syncthing.net/ syncthing stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/syncthing.list

\# Update and install syncthing:
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install syncthing
```
###

  `i`  `Esc`  `:wq` ()

Post.title: BT transmission docker
Post._content:
docker transmission  BT 

<!--more-->

>  [ 10  50 ](https://www.vultr.com/?ref=8161953-4F)
>  50

 docker  qbittorrent BT 

![qb speed](https://i.loli.net/2019/09/10/lJAEmdBpbHKe4u5.png)

 transmission 

> 

###  docker
```
curl -sSL https://get.docker.com/ | sh
```

###  transmission
```
docker run -d \
--restart=always \
--name transmission \
-v /home/tr/torrents:/to_download \
-v /home/tr/download:/output \
-p 9091:9091 \
-p 51413:51413 \
-e USERNAME=admin \
-e PASSWORD=admin \
jaymoulin/transmission
```
### 
 IP:9091  transmission 
 `/home/tr/download` 

 caddy  FTP 

### 

 http 

 caddy
```
    wget -N --no-check-certificate https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToyoDAdoubi/doubi/master/caddy_install.sh && chmod +x caddy_install.sh && bash caddy_install.sh
```

```
echo ":80 {  
 root /home/tr
 timeouts none  
 gzip  
 browse  
}" > /usr/local/caddy/Caddyfile
```
 caddy
```
    /etc/init.d/caddy start
```
 80 
```
ufw allow 80
```
 `IP`  MP4
